headline: Coinbase Is Offering Loans Against Your Bitcoin. Should You Get One?
summary: If you're a Coinbase user, you may be able to use the bitcoin you own as collateral to get a loan thanks to a new service launched Thursday. But the offering has its risks.

raw.headline: Coinbase Is Offering Loans Against Your Bitcoin. Should You Get One?
raw.summary: If you're a Coinbase user, you may be able to use the bitcoin you own as collateral to get a loan thanks to a new service launched Thursday. But the offering has its risks.

headline: 5 U.S. Giants to Buy With Robust EPS Estimate Revision in Last 30 Days
summary: Five high-flying U.S. corporate giants with top Zacks Rank have seen solid EPS Estimate Revision in Last 30 Days. These are: AMZN, COIN, MRVL, TRV, UAL.

headline: Coinbase Global (COIN) Rebounded Strongly in Q4
summary: Patient Capital Management, a value investing firm, released its “Patient Capital Opportunity Equity Strategy” fourth quarter 2024 investor letter. A copy of the letter can be downloaded here. During the quarter, the strategy returned 8.2% net of fees compared to the S&P 500’s 2.4% return. According to a three-factor performance attribution model, allocation and selection […]

headline: Coinbase to Offer Bitcoin-Backed Loans Through Morpho
summary: The ability to post collateral, rather than credit rating, will determine whether a client can borrow.
